EmailTemplate.name: RE: NFCU (1330378738.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: NFCU (1330378738.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Tom, I am sorry they are giving you trouble about working with MBO; I usually do not have that issue. I would be happy to call and speak with them but from what you tell me it doesn’t seem like they will be willing to listen. The only other thing I can think of is to have you sign From: <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Contract_Acknowledgement_Form.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCWl9X%2B3d35%2FmAArnkkTDCaJGsvLkzCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D">Contract Acknowledgement Form this would allow MBO to bill NFCU without a contract. Let me know what you think. Thanks Tom,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. <span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma","sans-serif";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"> Tom Glatt [mailto:tglatt@glattconsulting.com] Sent: Monday, February 27, 2012 4:27 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: NFCU Hi Sara, I'm running into a problem with Northern. They are resisting the MBO relationship on this project, and would prefer to deal through our existing LLC. I have not yet found out the specific points of concern - I will do that tomorrow - but suffice to say we may need to pull this one back. Any thoughts? Tom -- Thomas A. Glatt, Jr.Glatt Consulting, LLCPhone: (888) 217-5988, Ext. 801Online: <http://www.glattconsulting.com" target="_blank">www.glattconsulting.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> Email: <mailto:tglatt@glattconsulting.com" target="_blank">tglatt@glattconsulting.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> Twitter: <http://twitter.com/tglatt" target="_blank">http://twitter.com/tglatt<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> LinkedIn: <http://www.linkedin.com/in/tomglatt" target="_blank">http://www.linkedin.com/in/tomglatt<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>
